title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 62 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 62 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，照耶杜顿的作法，交与伶长）我的心默默无声，专等候神。我的救恩是从他而来。

lineList.en: He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.
lineList.cn: 惟独他是我的磐石，我的拯救。他是我的高台。我必不很动摇。

lineList.en: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.
lineList.cn: 你们大家攻击一人，把他毁坏。如同毁坏歪斜的墙，将倒的壁，要到几时呢。

lineList.en: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.
lineList.cn: 他们彼此商议，专要从他的尊位上把他推下。他们喜爱谎话。口虽祝福，心却咒诅。（细拉）

lineList.en: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
lineList.cn: 我的心哪，你当默默无声，专等候神。因为我的盼望是从他而来。

lineList.en: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.
lineList.cn: 惟独他是我的磐石，我的拯救。他是我的高台。我必不动摇。

lineList.en: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.
lineList.cn: 我的拯救，我的荣耀，都在乎神。我力量的磐石，我的避难所，都在乎神。

lineList.en: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你们众民当时时倚靠他，在他面前倾心吐意。神是我们的避难所。（细拉）

lineList.en: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.
lineList.cn: 下流人真是虚空，上流人也是虚假。放在天平里就必浮起。他们一共比空气还轻。

lineList.en: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.
lineList.cn: 不要仗势欺人，也不要因抢夺而骄傲。若财宝加增，不要放在心上。

lineList.en: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.
lineList.cn: 神说了一次，两次，我都听见，就是能力都属乎神。

lineList.en: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
lineList.cn: 主阿，慈爱也是属乎你。因为你照着各人所行的报应他。
